gobblin.source.extractor.filebased

Class FileBasedSource<S,D>

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.source.extractor.extract.AbstractSource<S,D>
      • gobblin.source.extractor.filebased.FileBasedSource<S,D>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    gobblin.source.Source<S,D>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AvroFileSource, DatePartitionedDailyAvroSource, SftpSource

    public abstract class FileBasedSource<S,D>
extends AbstractSource<S,D>
    This class is a base class for file based sources, it provides default functionality for keeping track of which files have already been pulled by the framework and for determining which files need to be pulled in this run

      • initLogger

        protected void initLogger(gobblin.configuration.SourceState state)
        Initialize the logger.
        Parameters:
        state - Source state

      • getWorkunits

        public java.util.List<gobblin.source.workunit.WorkUnit> getWorkunits(gobblin.configuration.SourceState state)
        This method takes the snapshot seen in the previous run, and compares it to the list of files currently in the source - it then decided which files it needs to pull and distributes those files across the workunits; it does this comparison by comparing the names of the files currently in the source vs. the names retrieved from the previous state
        Parameters:
        state - is the source state
        Returns:
        a list of workunits for the framework to run

      • getcurrentFsSnapshot

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getcurrentFsSnapshot(gobblin.configuration.State state)
        This method is responsible for connecting to the source and taking a snapshot of the folder where the data is present, it then returns a list of the files in String format
        Parameters:
        state - is used to connect to the source
        Returns:
        a list of file name or paths present on the external data directory

      • shutdown

        public void shutdown(gobblin.configuration.SourceState state)

        public abstract void initFileSystemHelper(gobblin.configuration.State state)
                                   throws FileBasedHelperException
        Throws:
        FileBasedHelperException
